tools.name: seeker
tools.description: Accurately Locate Smartphones using Social Engineering
tools.install:
git clone https://github.com/thewhiteh4t/seeker.git
cd seeker/
chmod +x install.sh
./install.sh
tools.author: thewhiteh4t

tools.name: Findomain
tools.description: The fastest and complete solution for domain recognition
tools.install:
pkg install rust make perl
                  cargo install findomain
                  cd $HOME/.cargo/bin
                  ./findomain
tools.author: findomain

tools.name: BruteX
tools.description: Automatically brute force all services running on a target
tools.author: 1n3

tools.name: trape
tools.description: Track and execute intelligent social engineering attacks in real time
tools.install:
git clone https://github.com/jofpin/trape.git
                  cd trape
                  python3 trape.py -h
tools.author: jofpin

tools.name: gcat
tools.description: A PoC backdoor that uses Gmail as a C&C server.
tools.install:
git clone https://github.com/byt3bl33d3r/gcat
                  cd gcat
                  python3 gcat.py
tools.author: byt3bl33d3r

tools.name: FBHT
tools.install:
git clone https://github.com/chinoogawa/fbht
                  cd fbht
                  python3 main.py
tools.author: chinoogawa

tools.name: netattack
tools.description: A simple python script to scan and attack wireless networks.
tools.install:
git clone https://github.com/chrizator/netattack
                  cd netattack
                  python3 netattack.py
tools.author: chrizator
